content: Mayor’s Remarks:1. The Agriculture Bureau should continue with all types of promotions to increase the sales of milkfish. In addition, the season of green skinned Ponkan just begins. Promotion activities on produce should be enhanced to raise the sales.2. Starting from tomorrow (October 21), the City Council will begin the interpellation session. All bureaus should send information about the concerned issues to the mayor’s office. During the interpellation, if heads of bureaus or I do not reply certain questions clearly, bureaus should compile complete information and give timely responses so that media won’t produce unfair news stories.3. When incidents happen in kindergartens and schools, both Bureau of Social Affairs and Bureau of Education should get involved at the same time. Both bureaus should review the handling process and make sure that children’s interest is protected.
